abstract: Several European privacy regulators, particularly in France, have urged that the so-called right to be forgotten be applied to all of Google’s search domains.
snippet: Several European privacy regulators, particularly in France, have urged that the so-called right to be forgotten be applied to all of Google’s search domains.
lead_paragraph: France’s privacy watchdog just will not take no for an answer.

headline.main: France Rejects Google’s Efforts to Limit Application of Privacy Ruling
headline.print_headline: France Rejects Google Again Over Privacy

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Commission Nationale de l'Informatique et des Libertes (CNIL)
